attractions.name: Raffles City Chongqing Observation Deck (来福士观景台)
attractions.location: Raffles City InterContinental, Chaotianmen
attractions.notes: Morning visit after luggage check-in. Panoramic views of Yangtze and Jialing rivers confluence. Breakfast at Raffles City after visit.

attractions.name: Huguang Guild Hall (湖广会馆)
attractions.location: Changjiang Binjiang Road, Bajiaoyuan No.1
attractions.notes: Traditional Qing dynasty guild hall with ornate architecture. Located near river area, easy access from Raffles City.

attractions.name: Xiayao Li (下浩里) & Longmenhao Old Street (龙门浩老街)
attractions.location: Nanbin Road 105, near Shangxinjie Metro Station
attractions.notes: Afternoon visit. Historic riverside neighborhood with cafes, bookstores, and 熹玥盒子. Free entry, great for photography and leisurely strolling. Adjacent areas within walking distance.

attractions.name: Liziba Station (李子坝单轨穿楼) - Optional
attractions.location: Liziba Zheng Street 62, Liziba Metro Station Exit 1
attractions.notes: Optional if time permits. Famous monorail station where train passes through building. Viewing platform available. Free attraction.

attractions.name: Hongyadong (洪崖洞民俗风貌区) - Optional
attractions.location: Jialing River Binjiang Road 88
attractions.notes: Optional evening visit before hotpot dinner. Best viewed at night when illuminated. Can be crowded. Free entry.

attractions.name: Nankang Slope (南龛坡)
attractions.location: Nankang Road South Section, Bazhou District
attractions.notes: Option 1 for afternoon family activity. Local scenic area with Buddhist grottos and hillside park. Free entry. Good for leisurely walk with family. Not heavily touristed. Choose between this and Wangwang Mountain based on family preference.

attractions.name: Wangwang Mountain Sports Park (望王山运动公园)
attractions.location: West Wangwang Road, Bazhou District
attractions.notes: Option 2 for afternoon family activity. Mountain park with observation platform (望王山仙踪观景台) near family home at 半山逸城A区. Free entry. Good views of Bazhong city. Easy hiking trails. More convenient location close to residence. Choose between this and Nankang Slope.

attractions.name: Chengdu Taikoo Li (成都太古里)
attractions.location: Zhong Shamao Street 8, Chunxi Road area
attractions.notes: Evening stroll after arriving in Chengdu. Modern lifestyle district with boutiques, cafes, and restaurants. Perfect for orientation walk and dinner area exploration. Morning left free for relaxed start after 除夕 late night celebrations.

attractions.name: Chengdu Giant Panda Breeding Research Base (成都大熊猫繁育研究基地)
attractions.location: Xiongmao Avenue 1375, North Third Ring Road
attractions.notes: Arrive 9:00am, leave by 10:00am as planned. Early morning is best time to see pandas active. Book tickets online in advance. Take Metro Line 3 to Xiongmao Avenue Station. Limited 1-hour visit due to afternoon flight.

attractions.name: Jinli Ancient Street (锦里古街)
attractions.location: Wuhou Temple Street 231, Wuhou District
attractions.notes: Quick visit before flight. Traditional Qing dynasty style street with snacks and crafts. Free entry. Close to city center, easy access before heading to airport.

attractions.name: The Bund (外滩)
attractions.location: Zhongshan East Road No.1, Huangpu District
attractions.notes: Iconic Shanghai skyline views across Huangpu River. Historic colonial buildings on west side, Pudong skyscrapers on east. Best in morning (9-11am) to avoid crowds. Walking promenade with observation decks. Free entry. INFJ-friendly: quieter in early morning.

attractions.name: People's Square (人民广场) - Brief Stop
attractions.location: Renmin Avenue 185, Huangpu District
attractions.notes: Brief stop as requested. Central location with fountain. Good for orientation. Near Shanghai Museum if interested. Free.

attractions.name: plusone coffee (安福路店)
attractions.location: Anfu Road 156, Hunan Road area, Xuhui District
attractions.notes: INFJ-friendly specialty coffee shop on famous Anfu Road. Cozy atmosphere, photogenic interior. Rating 4.4/5. Average spend ~55 RMB per person. Open 10:00-20:00 daily. Perfect for quiet coffee break and photography. Near Changshu Road Metro Station (Line 1/7).

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - plusone coffee安福路店

attractions.name: Gregorius SHADE
attractions.location: Anfu Road 53, Xuhui District (300m from Changshu Road Metro)
attractions.notes: Highly rated (4.6/5) cafe and boutique clothing store. INFJ-friendly quiet space with aesthetic design. Average spend ~45 RMB. Open 10:00-18:00 daily. Combines coffee culture with fashion shopping. Perfect for girlfriend's personality - cozy, photogenic, not crowded.

attractions.name: Wukang Road Walking Area (武康路历史文化名街)
attractions.location: Wukang Road, Xuhui District (intersection with Hunan Road)
attractions.notes: Famous tree-lined historic street in French Concession. Perfect for photography with European-style architecture. INFJ-friendly: peaceful walking area with boutique shops, cafes, and art galleries. Free to explore. Connects to Anfu Road area. Iconic Wukang Building at north end is Instagram-worthy landmark.

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 武康路历史文化名街

attractions.name: Garden Books (长乐店)
attractions.location: Changle Road 325, near Shaanxi South Road Metro (480m)
attractions.notes: Cozy English bookstore with cafe in French Concession. Rating 4.3/5. Open 10:00-22:00 daily. Perfect for girlfriend who loves English bookstores. INFJ-friendly quiet space with wide English book selection. Can browse and have coffee/tea. Also houses Taofeng Western Book Company.

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - Garden Books(长乐店)

attractions.name: Pudong Art Museum (浦东美术馆) - Optional
attractions.location: Binjiang Avenue 2777, Pudong District
attractions.notes: Optional if time permits. Contemporary art museum with rotating exhibitions. Waterfront location near Lujiazui. Quiet, INFJ-friendly atmosphere. Book tickets online in advance. Consider based on energy levels after walking French Concession.

attractions.name: Shanghai Disneyland (上海迪士尼乐园)
attractions.location: Shendixi Road 753, Chuansha Town, Pudong
attractions.notes: Full day visit. Book tickets online in advance (official app or website). Arrive early for rope drop. FastPass+ system available via app. Take Metro Line 11 to Disney Resort Station. Ticket price is standard weekday rate (varies by season). Park hours typically 9am-9pm. Popular attractions: TRON, Pirates of Caribbean, Enchanted Storybook Castle.

attractions.name: TOP TOY Global Flagship Store (上海全球旗舰店)
attractions.location: Nanjing East Road 558, Shanghai Tourism Product Building, Huangpu District
attractions.notes: TOP TOY global flagship - similar to Popmart but larger selection. Perfect for girlfriend who loves cute collectibles (潮玩店). Rating 4.7/5. Three floors of designer toys, blind boxes, anime figures. Near Nanjing East Road pedestrian street. Free entry, pay only for purchases. More curated and spacious than regular Popmart stores.

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - TOP TOY(上海全球旗舰店)

attractions.name: POP MART Jing'an Joy City (泡泡玛特静安大悦城南座店)
attractions.location: Xizang North Road 166, Jing'an Joy City South Tower 1F
attractions.notes: Official Popmart store in popular shopping mall. Rating 4.5/5. Full range of Popmart blind boxes and collectibles. Easy access near Qufu Road Metro Station. Can visit after TOP TOY for comparison. Free browsing.

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - POP MART泡泡玛特(静安大悦城南座店)

attractions.name: Tianzifang Arts District (上海田子坊)
attractions.location: Taikang Road 210, Huangpu District (next to Dapuqiao Metro Exit 1)
attractions.notes: Historic arts district with indie toy shops, boutique galleries, cafes. Rating 4.6/5. Open 24 hours but shops typically 10:00-20:00. INFJ-friendly: less touristy than Xintiandi, more authentic atmosphere. Narrow alleyways with unique shops - perfect for discovering hidden gems and photography. Free to explore.

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 上海田子坊

attractions.name: Garden Books (Revisit if not visited Day 5)
attractions.location: Changle Road 325, near Shaanxi South Road Metro
attractions.notes: If not visited on Day 5. Cozy English bookstore with cafe in French Concession. Rating 4.3/5. Open 10:00-22:00 daily. Perfect for girlfriend's love of English bookstores. INFJ-friendly quiet space. Note: Eslite Bookstore is located in Suzhou (not Shanghai), so Garden Books is the best option for English books in Shanghai.

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - Garden Books(长乐店)

attractions.name: French Concession Coffee Exploration
attractions.location: Anfu Road and surrounding streets, Xuhui District
attractions.notes: Specialty coffee scene on Anfu Road area. Multiple boutique cafes within walking distance: COSTA (Anfu Road 166), RACBAR (Anfu Road 322), Manner Coffee (Anfu Road 168), 13DE MARZO CAFÉ. All INFJ-friendly with cozy, photogenic interiors. See meals agent for detailed cafe recommendations and reviews.

attractions.name: Tsinghua University Campus (清华大学)
attractions.location: Haidian District, North Beijing
attractions.notes: Help girlfriend establish comfort zone. Campus tour to familiarize with area. Beautiful traditional Chinese architecture mixed with modern buildings. ID required for entry (passport). May need advance registration online. Large campus, focus on main areas near student services.

attractions.name: Peking University Campus (北京大学)
attractions.location: Haidian District, adjacent to Tsinghua
attractions.notes: Alternative or additional campus visit. Historic Weiming Lake (未名湖) is iconic. Similar entry requirements as Tsinghua. Both universities close to each other. Explore nearby restaurants and facilities for girlfriend's daily life support.

attractions.name: Nearby Life Support Facilities
attractions.location: Wudaokou and university neighborhood
attractions.notes: After campus tours, explore Wudaokou area (五道口) - student district with restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, and international food. Help girlfriend identify daily necessities locations: grocery stores, pharmacies, banks, metro stations.

attractions.name: University Neighborhood Exploration
attractions.location: Haidian District around rental apartment
attractions.notes: Continue establishing girlfriend's comfort zone. After dance studio registration, explore more local amenities. Evening activities possible after class.

attractions.name: Forbidden City (故宫博物院)
attractions.location: Jingshan Front Street 4, Dongcheng District
attractions.notes: Full day available. Book tickets online in advance (mandatory, through official website). Enter from Meridian Gate (午门), exit from Gate of Divine Prowess (神武门). Audio guide recommended. Allow 3-4 hours minimum. Avoid Tuesdays (closed). Popular palaces: Hall of Supreme Harmony, Imperial Garden, Palace of Gathered Elegance, Clock Museum.

attractions.name: Nanluoguxiang (南锣鼓巷) OR 798 Art District (798艺术区)
attractions.location: Nanluoguxiang: Dongcheng District (Metro Line 6/8). 798: Jiuxianqiao Road 4, Chaoyang District
attractions.notes: Choose based on interest: (1) Nanluoguxiang - historic hutong alley with cafes, boutiques, traditional architecture. Touristy but charming. Closer to Forbidden City. (2) 798 Art District - contemporary art galleries in former factory complex. Less crowded, more INFJ-friendly. Modern art scene. Both free entry. 798 requires taxi/Didi from city center.

attractions.name: Coffee Shops & Cute Shops
attractions.location: Various neighborhoods - Sanlitun, Gulou, Wudaokou
attractions.notes: Explore Beijing's specialty coffee scene and designer toy shops. Sanlitun area has many lifestyle boutiques. See meals and shopping agents for specific recommendations.

attractions.name: Shopping for Fashion Items
attractions.location: Sanlitun Taikoo Li, Xidan, or Wangfujing
attractions.notes: If desired. Major shopping districts: Sanlitun Taikoo Li (high-end, similar to Chengdu Taikoo Li), Xidan (mid-range Chinese brands), Wangfujing (department stores). See shopping agent for details.

attractions.name: Free Day - Flexible Planning
attractions.location: Various options
attractions.notes: Options: (1) Temple of Heaven Park (天坛) - historic temple complex with beautiful architecture. (2) Summer Palace (颐和园) - imperial garden with Kunming Lake. (3) Jingshan Park (景山公园) - hill park behind Forbidden City with panoramic city views. (4) More hutong exploration. (5) Museums: National Museum, Capital Museum. Plan based on weather and mood.

attractions.name: Tianjin Day Trip - Optional
attractions.location: Tianjin city, 30-min high-speed train from Beijing
attractions.notes: If desired, day trip to Tianjin. High-speed train 30 minutes from Beijing South Station to Tianjin. Attractions: (1) Italian Style Street (意大利风情街) - European architecture. (2) Ancient Culture Street (古文化街) - traditional shops and temples. (3) Haihe River waterfront. (4) Five Great Avenues (五大道) - colonial-era mansions, good for photography. (5) Porcelain House (瓷房子) - unique museum. Train cost ~54 RMB one-way.

attractions.name: Alternative: Beijing Free Day
attractions.location: Beijing
attractions.notes: If not going to Tianjin, more Beijing exploration. Options same as Day 15. Or relaxed day at cafes and local neighborhoods.

attractions.name: Final Day Activities - Shopping & Memorable Experiences
attractions.location: Various
attractions.notes: Last full day together. Options: (1) Revisit favorite spots from trip. (2) Final shopping for gifts/souvenirs. (3) Lama Temple (雍和宫) - beautiful Tibetan Buddhist temple. (4) National Centre for Performing Arts if special show available. (5) Romantic dinner at special restaurant (see meals agent). (6) Photography at scenic spots. Make it memorable.

notes: Attractions research regenerated for Days 1-4 on 2026-02-08. All recommendations verified via Gaode Maps POI search (gaode-maps skill). Day 1 Chongqing attractions confirmed: Raffles City Observation Deck, Huguang Guild Hall (B0017822LZ), Xiayao Li/Longmenhao Old Street (B0FFJ0756U), Liziba Light Rail Station (B0FFLH5QFT), Hongyadong (B0FFG8V7SH). Day 2 Bazhong now includes two options: Nankang Slope (B0FFIABFF3) and Wangwang Mountain Sports Park (B0FFI2XCY9) - both verified and located in Bazhou District. Day 3 Chengdu Taikoo Li confirmed (B0FFF6X49V). Day 4 Chengdu attractions verified: Giant Panda Base (B001C7WE5S), Jinli Ancient Street (B0FFFD3P2C). RedNote verification attempted but encountered X server display error (Playwright browser requires headed mode with display). All POI data sourced from Gaode Maps with confirmed addresses and type codes. GPS coordinates available in GCJ-02 coordinate system. Costs estimated per person in USD (converted from RMB at 1:7 rate). Duration estimates include typical visit time but not transportation. Days 5-21 preserved from previous research (verified 2026-02-05). Shanghai Day 5 and Day 7 INFJ-friendly recommendations include plusone coffee (4.4/5), Gregorius SHADE cafe/boutique (4.6/5), Wukang Road historic walking area, Garden Books English bookstore, TOP TOY Global Flagship (4.7/5), Popmart stores, Tianzifang arts district. Girlfriend's schedule constraints respected throughout: Days 11-12, 17-19 have limited attractions due to classes. Photography interests and INFJ-friendly quiet spaces accommodated. Beijing university area comfort zone established Days 9-10.
